The Amalgamation

The client wanted a logo for her new business that was strong, and mysterious. Something that symbolized multiple entities coming together to form something larger.

We decided that this design fit well and worked on a few different variations. We experimented with a few versions and chose the black, gold, and blue design as the winner.

We worked through a couple different versions of how the lockup would do with the text. How we would incorporate the into the logo was tricky.

Here is the final version of the logo for The Amalgamation. If you look at the negative space, there are several different A's in the mark. I am very happy that the client is very happy about this logo. I am proud of it for sure.

Christian Ulrich©
